name: bo thuston
text: NEVER SHOWED UP OR EVEN CALLED ! Elizabeth was very friendly on the phone and gave me details about their work. But she and Josh (who she said was coming with her ) never showed up on Tuesday 5/11/21 at 9 am for their appointment. And still have not showed up or called or texted. Have not return my texts (3) or phone calls (2). The job was going to be 1-4 townhouses needing gutter repair and gutter guards My advice is to be careful relying on these two  -  they must have plenty of work. And I 'sugar-coated' this review compared to their reviews from other customers.

resp.text: Yes, we are very busy. However, we are very sorry that the appointment fell through the cracks yesterday. If you are still interested, please call or email (jandeservicesal@gmail.com). The phone number for the business, unfortunately, does not receive text messages.

name: John Gasser
text: AVOID these scoundrels. They installed gutter screens for me. The work was poor to unacceptable. It took several calls to get them to come back and remediate the job. Then I noticed one of the gutters they put up was sagging in the middle preventing the water from draining. I called Josh the owner I believe. He said to send pictures which I did and have a confirmation of receipt. When I tried to call him to confirm receipt he had blocked my number. The next day I called him from a different number he answered and said he did not get the pictures which I had confirmation of his receiving. I told him I would resend them. He told me his salesman Brandon would call me ASAP. I am still waiting for Brandon's call. There are many good honest companies doing gutter guard work. Why deal with dishonest unprofessional people like J&E. AVOID them like the Corona virus.

name: Lael Gore
text: Several issues initially...but this company followed up and completed the job to my satisfaction. I recommend and will use them again when needed.

name: Cheryl Brewer
text: Gutters were not installed properly,  but the owner Josh quickly corrected to my satisfaction.

name: Joseph Greer
text: Fast, great work, great price

name: Dennis Swancoat
text: Had them come out to repair gutter it still leaked so called back to have it fixed they said when I finally got a response after about a week they would be here next day haven't heard from them since and it's been another week?

text: Very organized and efficient

resp.text: Awesome to hear! Thanks so much for the review Ms. Kathy.

name: David Chalk
text: Window Genie was on time and did a great job. I would recommend them to anyone. They are reasonably priced and pay attention to details

resp.text: Thanks so much Mr. David! We greatly appreciate the review and great customers!

name: Terry Walker
text:
Very good service. My house  and windows are incredibly clean. Look like it's just been repainted.
I would recommend.

resp.text: Thanks so much Mrs. Terry! Thanks for the business and the feedback. Let us know if we can help with anything else.

name: Jean Jenkins
text: Window Genie did a great job on my windows, inside and out. What a pleasure to gaze out of sparkling clean, streak-free windows!!  A+

resp.text: Awesome! Thanks so much for the review Ms. Jean. We love to see these great reviews and happy customers!

name: John Hadder
text: Very through with their cleaning. They took the time necessary to ensure the job wash done right. They also cleaned our areas covered in cement. All the staff were friendly. I was very happy with the results.

resp.text: Awesome review Mr. John! Thanks for your review and your business!

name: Tracy M. Holiday
text: Brandon and his team were excellent! They pressure washed three properties for me, houses and decks, and did an amazing job. I highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the review Mrs. Tracy! You have been amazing to work for and we truly appreciate your business.

name: Evelyn Brown
text: They tinted my sun room  windows.  They done a great job. Keep up the good work guy's. 👍

resp.text: Thank you for the review Mrs. Evelyn! You guys are a pleasure to do work for and I hope we can help you again down the road.

name: Patricia McPhillips
text: Emily and Chris were on time,very professional and did everything that I asked for.  Our windows look outstanding,  the concrete patios ,the sidewalks look amazing and the house is sparkling.  The owner, Brandon, was also very responsive with the estimate and very nice to work with.  Price was very fair for all that was done.  Highly recommended and will be setting up a regular service.

resp.text: Awesome! Thanks for the review Mrs Pat. I love to pass these along to our techs and most of all love happy customers. Let’s us know if you need anything at all.

name: Nicole Pylant
text: Window Genie did a wonderful job cleaning our circular drive! I would definitely recommend them and plan on using them again!

resp.text: Awesome review from an awesome person! Thanks so much! We love making people happy and cant wait to hear from you again.

name: Nita Fitz-Gerald
text: They did a great job!! Will be using them again and again!!

name: Sue Odham
text: Arrived on time and did an awesome job. My windows never looked this good !  Soft pressure washing did the job!  All of this after a Category 2 hurricane!  Exterior was covered with debris and salt,  I would absolutely recommend them

resp.text: Thanks so much Mrs. Odham! This is an awesome review from awesome customers. Please refer us to all your friends and let us know if you need anything else.

name: Terrie McDaniel
text: The Window Genie team (of two ) were amazing!  My windows are clean!  I could not believe how quickly they worked and it was a hot afternoon!  I will certainly call again!

resp.text: Super awesome review Mrs. Terrie! So glad you're happy with the window cleaning. We can wait to hear from you and please recommend us to your friends.

name: C. S. Brandon Moore
text: They arrived promptly on the day of installation and worked quickly, effectively, and respectfully. Highly recommend them and their product.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Brandon! Awesome name by the way! We hope you enjoy the the new cooler room.

name: Lisa Lopez
text: This was my first time using Window Genie and I was extremely SATISFIED!  I had my house, porches, driveway and fence pressure washed.  They did an amazing job! They were on time, very courteous and  professional!  I will definitely use them again and have already recommended to my family and friends!

resp.text: Thank you so much Mrs. Lisa! This is an awesome review and i'm glad we could help! Let us know if there is anything else we can do to help.

name: Edward Wheland
text: I would recommend to all. They do a wonderful job.I just can’t say enough about their commitment to doing the job right and making sure you are pleased with the results. We will definitely be a repeat customer. Thank you Brandon and Emily.

resp.text: This is awesome Mr. Wheland! Thanks for the review and being an awesome customer!

name: Susan Smith
text: Thanks for the excellent work cleaning my windows inside and outside.  Owner called promptly and came the next day for quote. Half hour later my windows were being cleaned. Such a great experience

resp.text: Thanks so much for the review Mrs. Susan! We love great customers like you and hope you keep us mind for some of our other services.

name: Jason Shipp
text: I highly recommend Brandon and his staff at Window Genie of the Gulf Coast.  They were on time and did a wonderful job cleaning bot of our offices.  We will definitely be using his company in the future.

resp.text: Awesome review Jason! And we very much appreciate the chance to do work for you.

name: Linda Heitzman
text: This outfit was so very easy to work with and to schedule.  Very pleased...so happy to have found them.

resp.text: This is awesome Mr. Linda! Thanks so much for the review and hope to see you soon. Please let all your friends around Gulf Shores know about us and we also window tint, pressure wash and gutter clean.

name: Brittany Jones
text: Great service, very timely and professional. End results were absolutely amazing! Thank y’all so much, and continue to keep up the good work.

resp.text: Thank you Mrs. Brittany! We love the feedback and hope to see you again soon!

name: Mariah Gartman
text: They did such a great job, I would recommend them to everyone. I will definitely use them again. I was so impressed with the window cleaning.

resp.text: Thanks so much Mrs. Mariah! And thanks for all you do! I'm glad we got a chance to help you and please refer us to your friends.

name: Tina Burgard
text: Window sun film was applied very professionally & neatly.

resp.text: Thanks so much Mrs. Tina! Hope you enjoy your window film.Let us know if you need anything else.

name: JP Ashworth
text:
The technicians showed up on time, were professional and worked diligently until the job as was done.

They even cleaned up beyond what the needed to.

Will use again!

resp.text: Awesome review Mr. JP! Good to know the technicians are still going above and beyond on gutter cleanings.

name: Jennifer Reid
text: Window Genie, highly recommended! Professional and courteous, they deliver on the finished product. Awesome work!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the review Mrs. Reid! You are the best!

name: Rethea Boatwright
text:
Emily and Brad came on time and had everything they needed to complete my window cleaning job in a very reasonable time
I highly recommend these two because of the excellent service and friendliness

resp.text: Thank so much for the review Mrs. Diane! Emily and Brad are pretty great and love to hear the glowing recognition from customers. Please let us know if we can do anything to help.

name: Nancy Cortright
text: Quality job with professional people

resp.text: Thanks so much you guys! So glad you enjoyed the house washing and window cleaning! Let us know if you ever need anything else.

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review Mrs. Judy. You have a beautiful view there in Gulf Shores and we would love to do work there anytime.

The technicians showed up on time, were professional and worked diligently until the job as was done.

They even cleaned up beyond what the needed to.

Will use again!

resp.text: Awesome review Mr. JP! Good to know the technicians are still going above and beyond on gutter cleanings.

name: Jennifer Reid
text: Window Genie, highly recommended! Professional and courteous, they deliver on the finished product. Awesome work!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the review Mrs. Reid! You are the best!

name: Rethea Boatwright
text:
Emily and Brad came on time and had everything they needed to complete my window cleaning job in a very reasonable time
I highly recommend these two because of the excellent service and friendliness

resp.text: Thank so much for the review Mrs. Diane! Emily and Brad are pretty great and love to hear the glowing recognition from customers. Please let us know if we can do anything to help.

name: Nancy Cortright
text: Quality job with professional people

resp.text: Thanks so much you guys! So glad you enjoyed the house washing and window cleaning! Let us know if you ever need anything else.

name: Judy Faust
text: They put black out film on my windows, did a great job.

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review Mrs. Judy. You have a beautiful view there in Gulf Shores and we would love to do work there anytime.

name: Sharon Wallace
text: This company was prompt, courteous, efficient and well priced!  They cleaned my gutters and I plan to have them back to clean my driveway.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the review Mrs. Sharon! We always appreciate feedback and will see you soon to clean that driveway.

name: Lloyd Gardner
text: They did a great job at a reasonable price

resp.text: Thanks Mr. Lloyd! We appreciate the review and keep us mind for any of your pressure washing or window cleaning needs.

name: Christian DeArco
text: Fast! Reliable! Great price!!!

resp.text: Awesome Christian! Thanks so much for the reviews.

name: Kathy H Thompson

resp.text: Awesome to hear! Thanks so much for the review Ms. Kathy.

name: David Chalk
text: Window Genie was on time and did a great job. I would recommend them to anyone. They are reasonably priced and pay attention to details

resp.text: Thanks so much Mr. David! We greatly appreciate the review and great customers!

name: Terry Walker
text:
Very good service. My house  and windows are incredibly clean. Look like it's just been repainted.
I would recommend.

resp.text: Thanks so much Mrs. Terry! Thanks for the business and the feedback. Let us know if we can help with anything else.

name: Jean Jenkins
text: Window Genie did a great job on my windows, inside and out. What a pleasure to gaze out of sparkling clean, streak-free windows!!  A+

resp.text: Awesome! Thanks so much for the review Ms. Jean. We love to see these great reviews and happy customers!

name: John Hadder
text: Very through with their cleaning. They took the time necessary to ensure the job wash done right. They also cleaned our areas covered in cement. All the staff were friendly. I was very happy with the results.

resp.text: Awesome review Mr. John! Thanks for your review and your business!

name: Tracy M. Holiday
text: Brandon and his team were excellent! They pressure washed three properties for me, houses and decks, and did an amazing job. I highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the review Mrs. Tracy! You have been amazing to work for and we truly appreciate your business.

name: Evelyn Brown
text: They tinted my sun room  windows.  They done a great job. Keep up the good work guy's. 👍

resp.text: Thank you for the review Mrs. Evelyn! You guys are a pleasure to do work for and I hope we can help you again down the road.

name: Patricia McPhillips
text: Emily and Chris were on time,very professional and did everything that I asked for.  Our windows look outstanding,  the concrete patios ,the sidewalks look amazing and the house is sparkling.  The owner, Brandon, was also very responsive with the estimate and very nice to work with.  Price was very fair for all that was done.  Highly recommended and will be setting up a regular service.

resp.text: Awesome! Thanks for the review Mrs Pat. I love to pass these along to our techs and most of all love happy customers. Let’s us know if you need anything at all.

name: Nicole Pylant
text: Window Genie did a wonderful job cleaning our circular drive! I would definitely recommend them and plan on using them again!

resp.text: Awesome review from an awesome person! Thanks so much! We love making people happy and cant wait to hear from you again.

name: Nita Fitz-Gerald
text: They did a great job!! Will be using them again and again!!

name: Sue Odham
text: Arrived on time and did an awesome job. My windows never looked this good !  Soft pressure washing did the job!  All of this after a Category 2 hurricane!  Exterior was covered with debris and salt,  I would absolutely recommend them

resp.text: Thanks so much Mrs. Odham! This is an awesome review from awesome customers. Please refer us to all your friends and let us know if you need anything else.

name: Terrie McDaniel
text: The Window Genie team (of two ) were amazing!  My windows are clean!  I could not believe how quickly they worked and it was a hot afternoon!  I will certainly call again!

resp.text: Super awesome review Mrs. Terrie! So glad you're happy with the window cleaning. We can wait to hear from you and please recommend us to your friends.

name: C. S. Brandon Moore
text: They arrived promptly on the day of installation and worked quickly, effectively, and respectfully. Highly recommend them and their product.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Brandon! Awesome name by the way! We hope you enjoy the the new cooler room.

name: Lisa Lopez
text: This was my first time using Window Genie and I was extremely SATISFIED!  I had my house, porches, driveway and fence pressure washed.  They did an amazing job! They were on time, very courteous and  professional!  I will definitely use them again and have already recommended to my family and friends!

resp.text: Thank you so much Mrs. Lisa! This is an awesome review and i'm glad we could help! Let us know if there is anything else we can do to help.

text: I would recommend to all. They do a wonderful job.I just can’t say enough about their commitment to doing the job right and making sure you are pleased with the results. We will definitely be a repeat customer. Thank you Brandon and Emily.

resp.text: This is awesome Mr. Wheland! Thanks for the review and being an awesome customer!

name: Susan Smith
text: Thanks for the excellent work cleaning my windows inside and outside.  Owner called promptly and came the next day for quote. Half hour later my windows were being cleaned. Such a great experience

text: I highly recommend Brandon and his staff at Window Genie of the Gulf Coast.  They were on time and did a wonderful job cleaning bot of our offices.  We will definitely be using his company in the future.

name: Beth Sewell
text: Adam and his associate came out to clean the windows at our home on Lake Martin recently. They were very professional and did an outstanding job. The windows look so clear and beautiful now. We can really enjoy our view of the lake. Both gentleman were so kind; and went above and beyond. We will definitely recommend Adam and Sparkle Window Cleaning Service to our neighbors and friends. Thank you so much.    Beth and Susan

name: BC
text: David and Dillion did a great job of washing windows-inside and out. The windows had years of pollen and dirt build up. Also pressure washed the deck. Everything they washed/pressured wash looks almost new. I would definitely recommend this company.

name: Joel Cornett
text: Sparkle confirmed our appointment the day before and the guys showed up on time and immediately began the job.  They were courteous, professional and answered all of our questions.  They pointed out a couple of little problems with our windows (thanks so much) and finished the job in fairly short order.  The results are dramatic and we are pleased with the service.  We will definitely call them again and will recommend Sparkle to neighbors and friends.  Thanks for everything guys!

name: Cassie Ball
text: We’ve done business with Sparkle for a few years now.  Brett Bodine is very reliable and they do a wonderful job.   Adam did a fantastic job on our windows.

name: Kevin Porter
text: Sparkle was one of the only companies I reached out to that quickly came to give me a quote on cleaning the exterior windows of my house. Brett, the owner, was very kind and personable on the phone. Kendrick and Blake came out and were punctual and professional. They did a great job! We will continue to use Sparkle in the future.

name: Stacy Howorth
text: It is so nice to find a Company that actually exceeds your expectations! From the quote , communication and the actual work our experience with Sparkle was outstanding. Great Company to work with. Will definitely use again. The two technicians worked so hard for hours in intense heat! Made it look easy and always had a smile on their faces. I so appreciate their hard work!

name: Cheryl Chisholm
text: Kendrick and Matt came out and were outstanding! They were on time, they were prepared, they were fast - and the windows and screens are fantastic now!  More than that, not only were they courteous, they were friendly; they are outgoing and put me at ease instantly.  I have an old, toothless Chi and a blind and deaf small-breed mix; of course, I tried to keep them out of the way - but both of them treated my dogs so sweetly.  They didn’t really have to do that, as some companies insist your pets be shut away from them while their employees are at your home.  The company, from the time I initially called them until they were finished and leaving, was professional.  The owner came out that day to give me an estimate (that would be written up and sent to me electronically), which I received and approved electronically the next day.  Later that day, the owner called to set up a day for the work.  It was an experience I’d recommend to anyone needing the kind of services they offer.

name: Cheryl Hagopian Layne
text: Adam and Kendrick were punctual, personable, and professional! They possess a great work ethic and do quality work. I am so very pleased with my beautifully sparkling-clean windows and with the entire experience. Sparkle should be very proud of these two employees - they represent the company very favorably!

name: Scott Girard
text: Sparkle is the most professional and responsive window cleaning operation I have ever used. I had never seen or heard of the technology and procedures they use for window cleaning, and it is incredible. Brett and his team are all awesome.  I recommend Sparkle to anyone needing the services they provide.

name: Cathy Watson
text: Sparkle was great to work with, and got everything done that I asked them to do. The pressure washing makes such a difference and made the sidewalks and stone retaining walls look so much better. I will definitely use them again.

name: Will Cabaniss
text: This is my 2nd time using  Sparkle.  Very easy process throughout.  A rep called me to schedule the appointment and then called a day or 2 prior to confirm.  Just before the service began, the technician called to let me know they were on site and getting started.  Overall I am very pleased with this company and will use them again.

name: Jill Carswell
text: The guys did a great job! They even removed our patio furniture and put it back for us. Our patio, driveway and sidewalk look great! Would definitely use Sparkle again!

name: Ben DeVane
text: Andrew and Dillon arrived as scheduled and immediately went to work.  They did exactly as I instructed and worked non-stop until done.  The windows look great.  I'm always pleased with Sparkle Window Cleaning and will continue to use them.

name: Amy Stucky
text: Kendrick , Matthew and Dillon did a great job today cleaning our house windows.   Very professional and courteous !  Love my clean , sparkling windows.  Definitely recommend , very affordable.

name: Kelli Rice
text: Wow! Cannot recommend this company enough! David did an AMAZING job pressure washing our home (eaves & soffits, front & back porch, pool deck). Very professional and he made sure everything was put back into place. I will definitely be using them again!

name: Faye Andrews
text: Wow!  Arrived on time and went right to work. Explained what they would be doing. Professional, courteous, clean, neat, and put everything back like they found it. When they left,  the only way I knew they had been here is my windows truly sparkled! I would recommend to family and friends.

name: April Speaks
text: Each time I use Sparkle Window cleaning they do a wonderful job.  From setting up the appointment with their staff and the gentlemen that come to perform the services they are wonderful to work with ! Alex and Andrew did a great job with my window cleaning.  They are very professional and kind.  I will definitely use them again! It's nice to see my windows sparkle!

name: Jenny Fuqua
text: Will definitely be using Sparkle again! They did an amazing job on all of our windows…fast, professional, and GREAT result!! 5 star service!

name: David Stahlhut
text: They were on time, professional, hard working , helpful and responsive.  It is a fairly large home and they were done, inside and out in about 3 hours.  Will use them again.

name: Leonard Taylor, Jr.
text: Adam and Kendrick provided a phenomenal service. They were timely, efficient, and especially professional and personable. I'd highly recommend them, and will be certain to request them again in the future.

name: Hubert Morrison
text: They were on time, worked quickly and were pleasant to work with. I certainly recommend Sparkle.

name: Randy Freeman
text: Easy to arrange service. House looks great.

name: Karen Blackmon Caldwell Somerset
text:
On time, let my little puppy follow him around and did a fantastic job...
Lilly gives Sparkel Window Cleaning five barks!!!

name: Libba McMillan
text: I was surprised by the affordability--was such a good experience and has improved the look of our house!!  I hope to have this done every year--it makes such a difference!

name: Kate Conkey
text: Kendrick Gibson and David Smith were great.   On time, professional, and thoughtful.   Our house not only looks great but will now also be safer for our kids.  During the cleaning, Kendrick found some issues which, if left undiscovered,  could have posed dangerous for our children and dog. Would recommend without reservations.

name: H Butler
text: Adam and Andrew did a wonderful job on our windows inside and out! We are so pleased with their work, but also their kindness and professionalism! We want them to come back again for other services and use them again for our windows later this year! I can't say enough on how pleased we are!! Many thanks!! Rick & Holly Butler

name: Suzanne Pope
text: David and Adam pressure washed (soft wash of eaves, soffits, and ceiling of the back porch) and washed all windows (inside and out) at our house.  They did an excellent job and were very professional. I was extremely pleased with the service provided and highly recommend Sparkle.

name: Richard Lykes
text: Brett Bodine was an excellent communicator, kept me updated as my scheduled appointment neared and performed a great job cleaning the interior and exterior windows.

name: Kathy Sams
text: Andrew and Blake did my windows today!   Awesome job!  So excited to start the lake season with sparkling windows!

name: Robert Ellis
text: Kendrick, Dylan and Andrew were professional and did an excellent job cleaning our windows.  I would highly recommend them and I will continue to use them in the future.

name: Luke Aplin
text: Adam and Blake did a great job cleaning the windows of our home. They were time, worked well together and very kind. We will have them back!

name: James Cleveland
text: David and coworker did a great job pressure washing my house. They were very careful and precise. Very pleased with results and will use them again and will refer them to friends and family.

name: JOSH ST. GERMAIN
text:
I own Saint & Sinners Tattoo Studio and our number 1 thing after quality is cleanliness. Sparkle is punctual & they mean business when it comes to CLEAN. Huge thank you to Adam + Blake & the Sparkle Crew!!!

-Josh St.Germain
Saint&SinnersTattooStudio
saintandsinnerstattoo.com

name: Jim Wade
text: Our professionals, Adam and David, were on time and worked throughout the job.  They did a great job, pointed out areas that needed extra attention, and left no mess or debris.  We are new to the area and will definitely use Sparkle for years to come!  Could not be more impressed!

name: Christa Sanders
text: David and Adam did a great job cleaning our soffets and gutters and windows, inside and out- they arrived in the time frame provided and immediately got to work. The job they did was thorough and they asked if there were any concerns before leaving. We will be using y'all again and recommending you to others.

name: Leslie Loftis
text: Kendrick and Andrew were very nice and professional. This was Andrews first time at our house , but Kendrick is always the one who comes and can always count on him to do a great job. Will be happy for Andrew to come back again because he was also great and dependable.

name: Sue Ann McMahan
text:
Kendrick has provided excellent service.  He has personal and professional pride in the company and clients.

David provided excellent power washing and very accommodating with every aspect.

If I can I’d request them every time.

name: Henry Jackson
text: They were on time, very courteous, and took pride in their work. Clean job!

name: Susan Murphree
text: David and Andrew did an amazing job cleaning all our windows inside and out!! They were very professional, worked from the second they arrived until they finished- took about 2 hours and I have a lot of windows!!!. They filled me in on all the other services they provide so I will be calling them back. Thank-you Andrew and David!!

name: Scott Slocum
text: Quick efficient process to get a qoute. Staff are prompt, polite and do a great job! Highly recommend them!

name: Tim Speaks
text: Adam and David were great. They were very professional and did an absolute great job. My windows are cleanest that they have ever been. I would highly recommend to anybody.

name: Rebecca Hatcher
text: Adam and Matt did a fabulous job. Windows look great!

name: John Johnson
text: Brett and the entire team understand customer service and quality from scheduling through billing, everything is always a pleasure!  The service team that came out this week was on time, very courteous, and did everything with a can do attitude and a smile, Thank You!!

name: Alice Bell
text: WOW! Adam and crew were professional in their conduct and the results are amazing. When I walked in the house after the interior and exterior window cleaning, my reaction was “WOW”!! We will use them again and again!

name: Tanner Bain
text: Technicians Adam and David did a great job on our gutters. We have a lot of leaves and they cleaned them all in a quickly and thoroughly. Also did a good job of cleanup afterward. Very pleased with Sparkle.

name: Hayley Management Company
text: David did a GREAT job. He was on time and the pressure wash he did on one of our rental properties looks fantastic! Thanks and we will definitely  use y’all again!

name: jeff kennelly
text: Brett and his team do top-notch work backed by superior customer service. The guys were here to clean gutters yesterday. Showed up on time and cleaned up so well after themselves it was hard to tell they had been here. I’ve used Sparkle before and will definitely use them again.

name: Alma Martin
text: Adam, Kendrick and Dillon were wonderful young men and did a great job.

name: DeWayne Purvis
text: Kendrick and Adam did a great job on my clinic’s windows! They were punctual and professional! I highly recommend them!

name: Glenn Johnson II
text: Special thank you to Kendrick and Blake, they did a fantastic job. Worked hard and fast, and did their best to keep the mess in my gutters out of my bushes and mulch patches. My gutters are hard to reach in some places and are shaded with thick trees in others, so it is not an easy job. They sprayed the front of my house for good message. Greatly appreciated. Definitely recommend

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Mr. Johnson!!  We appreciate the business!!

name: Carl Ciulla
text: The team arrives on time and work together to complete the job.  They are professional and courteous.  My windows and screens are shining!  I have used this company For a couple of years and always receive excellent service.  Adam and Andrew are great!

name: Kathy Sams
text: Andrew and Blake did my windows today!   Awesome job!  So excited to start the lake season with sparkling windows!

name: Caroline Sprinkle
text: Sparkles Window cleaning did an exceptional job on our exterior windows and gutters. Kendric and David were super professional, efficient and hard workers. They were tolerant of our curious four year old and engaged him in what they were doing! 10 out of 10 would recommend this company.

name: Sandra Beisel
text: We are so pleased with the job Sparkle did cleaning our windows and gutters. They look amazing! Adam and Kendrick were professional, polite and hard working. Brent was quick to respond to my call and gave a quote that was fair and reasonable. We have referred them to family members and will definitely call them again.

name: jeff kennelly
text: Brett and his team do top-notch work backed by superior customer service. The guys were here to clean gutters yesterday. Showed up on time and cleaned up so well after themselves it was hard to tell they had been here. I’ve used Sparkle before and will definitely use them again.

name: Tami Kneidinger
text: From the appointment setting, reminder call and payment process over the phone with Tabitha, to the window cleaning team that came to the house (Adam and David), the service was flawless.  I moved from Florida and the past 2 years, it has been challenging to find “the gems” when it comes to service providers, in any field of work. This is my 2nd year using Sparkle and I appreciate their timeliness, responsiveness, customer service and work ethic. David and Adam explained everything they were doing, they did a magnificent job on my windows, they alerted me to issues with a couple of windows, they cleaned up after themselves and made the whole process a pleasant one. Thank you for hiring a great staff!

name: Loretta See
text: David arrived as scheduled.  worked to complete our job, and told us if there were any  parts that we were not satisfied with, to call.  and he would come back.  There was NO need to call him back.

name: Teri Phipps
text: Kevin and Andrew showed up on time to wash my windows. I am thrilled with the job they did. VERY professional and personable. Went the extra mile to make sure our windows looked great for an  upcoming weekend wedding. Thank you guys!  Ask for Kevin and Andrew. They were fantastic!!!!

name: Donna Leatherman
text: The team was excellent today! They went over and above and the windows are clear and shiny.

name: Nola K
text: Highly recommend this company.  We are regulars now!  Always come out quickly and my windows look beautiful!  We have really high windows which are challenging and they do a fantastic job.   Call them for an estimate!  You will wonder why you didn't call them sooner.

name: Lisa Freeman
text: We are very pleased with the job Sparkle did!

name: Marsha Scott
text: Kendrick and Matthew did a wonderful job washing my windows. I have used Sparkle many times and they have never disappointed me with the work they have done. They are always on time and go above and beyond my expectations. I would highly recommend this company. Their employees are always professional and courteous.

text: Kendrick and Blake did an amazing job!  Our windows "Sparkle" like never before!

text: We love our Sparkle family!  They keep my windows sparkling!!

name: Gay Richards
text: The guys who came out were great. They cleaned our screened in deck as if it was theirs. The entire house and all the windows were indeed Sparkling!  Huge amount of attention to detail. Highly recommend.

text: Sparkles Window cleaning did an exceptional job on our exterior windows and gutters. Kendric and David were super professional, efficient and hard workers. They were tolerant of our curious four year old and engaged him in what they were doing! 10 out of 10 would recommend this company.

text:
Thanks Sparkle for our clean windows! Adam and crew did an amazing job today - as usual!

Becky & Howard

name: Barbara Ciulla
text: Jamie and Andrew arrived on time, were very personable, courteous and professional.  They worked in sync with each other...great team.  My windows and doors look fabulous. Thrilled to have this project done and will definitely schedule Sparkle again. Highly recommend!

name: Kitty Greene
text: Adam and Kendrick did a great job.  They were extremely polite and worked continuously for a total of 15 man hours.  I lived in a 100+ year old house which has its share of window problems but they went out of their way to do the best job possible.

name: Hubert Morrison
text: They were on time, worked quickly and were pleasant to work with. I certainly recommend Sparkle.

name: Tricia Golden
text: Adam and Blake were courteous, efficient and did an excellent job on my windows.  They look great!  Sparkle, overall, is a reliable and very professionally run business!

name: Mary Jo Johnson
text: We love using Sparkle for our windows and gutter cleaning!  Their guys are the best!!!

name: Andrew Burkhalter
text: They did a great job on our house. We didn't know they could be that clean. Very friendly and professional. Highly recommend them for your window cleaning.

name: Scott Slocum
text: Quick efficient process to get a qoute. Staff are prompt, polite and do a great job! Highly recommend them!

name: Gina Hawkins
text: Excellent job and our windows look so good. Professional and took that extra time.

name: Jason Kirkland
text:
David and Adam were outstanding!  Very professional and did a great job, will repeat!

Jason Kirkland

name: Penny Botta
text: Sparkle is a very professional company with wonderful representatives. Over the phone, Tabitha is so friend and easy to talk to.  She goes out of her way to accommodate any questions I have, even walking me through the website to find this page. Adam has cleaned our windows twice and does an awesome job.  We even have a fairly large sun room and he  makes it look brand new after he cleans it.  Adam is very courteous and takes extra care for my home, inside and out. He is extremely careful working around our house. I'm so happy I found Sparkle .

name: Rebecca Hatcher
text: Adam and Matt did a fabulous job. Windows look great!

name: Kelly Wallace
text: Brett and his team were prompt, friendly and professional.  All the members on the crew introduced themselves upon arrival and immediately got to work. They worked quickly and efficiently being careful to treat our home and belongings with care.  Our home has never looked better!  We look forward to getting on a regular maintenance program with the team from Sparkle.

name: Michael Arnold
text: Adam was at my house yesterday and did a great job cleaning the exterior glass in my windows. The windows have never looked this clean. He treated my furniture and even my dog with care. He also took the time to explain the cleaning procedures to me. If this employee is indicative of the other people you have working you have a great team. The person they sent cares about what he does and it shows.

name: Ginger Kelley
text:
We have just had our windows cleaned by Sparkle and couldn’t be more pleased!
Adam and Jermichael did a very professional job and couldn’t have been any nicer or more accommodating.  Some of our windows are in locations that are very difficult to access and clean and the effort they made to do the job well was greatly appreciated. This is the second time that we have had our windows cleaned by Sparkle and they just keep winning our admiration and gratitude for results that were beyond our expectations.

name: William Simmons
text: I wanted complement you and your team members, Adam and Blaze on a job very well done today on my windows, but most especially the thorough cleaning of the sills and tracks! They look amazing!!! Both gentlemen were super polite and did a great job! Just wanted you to know!

name: Pam Hudmon
text:
Adam was extremely professional and our windows look great!! We will definitely use them again!

Adam, thanks again for a great job!!

name: Emily Harris
text:
Andrew and Caleb did an outstanding job cleaning our windows today. They were so professional and conscientious of their job!
*Andrew and David returned to do the inside and outside window cleaning today and did another outstanding job!

name: Diane Glisson
text: Sparkle window cleaning does a great job.   The two techs that cleaned the outside of my home and cleaned my windows did a fantastic job yesterday.    Way to do a great job and pay attention to detail guys!!!!!!

name: Thomas Carlisle
text: Our second year to use Sparkle for window and gutter cleaning. Extremely pleased with professionalism of not only corporate booking staff, but also the crew performing work onsite. Caleb and Cole were prompt,  professional and friendly. Highly recommend the Spaekle team!

name: Paul McTear
text:
Kendrick and Cole did an excellent job cleaning all our windows.  We live on Lake Martin And our windows were very dirty.with carpenter bee insecticide spray, bird droppings, etc.
They really did sparkle when they were finished.

name: Robyn Carroll
text: Another awesome job done by the workers with Sparkle!!! They did their usual great work cleaning out our gutters and washing the windows.  The best part was how amazingly clean our driveway is after the pressure washing.

name: Rhonda Jones
text:
They did a great job on my hard to clean EZbreeze windows.
Thanks guys.

name: Mike Cook
text: Staff were on time, courteous, and professional.  They did an outstanding job.  Will use again.

name: Cathy Goode
text:
I am always pleased when I get an email that Sparkle is coming to my house and even more pleased when the technicians leave because when they leave my house, it "Sparkles"!
Great company and great employees

name: Lura New
text: Excellent service, and employees were very polite.

name: Kitty Greene
text: Adam and Kendrick did a great job.  They were extremely polite and worked continuously for a total of 15 man hours.  I lived in a 100+ year old house which has its share of window problems but they went out of their way to do the best job possible.

name: Gene LaBorde
text: The guys at sparkle did a fabulous job. They did not miss a detail. Polite and willing to answer all my questions. My house looks marvelous!  Andrew and Ricardo (?) were both courteous and professional. I will use sparkle again.

name: Bill Whatley
text: The crew did a great job. We will be calling on them again.

name: Dianne Davis
text: The guys with Sparkle are always nice and very understanding!  They keep me informed of what's going on if I can't be home while they're there.  Always on time and do a great job!  Kendrick is really nice and knowledgeable!  Thanks again guys!!

name: Marty Krauel
text: Very professionally run company!  Great communication.  The technician Kendrick, went out of his way to make sure that I was pleased with his work. I would not hesitate to recommend this company to anyone.

name: Matt Dabbs
text: Kendrick did a fantastic job. Very courteous and professional. Would definitely recommend! Thank you for coming and cleaning our windows and sidewalk.

name: Donna Purcell
text: We were so pleased with Sparkle window cleaning , the guys even cleaned all our screens, Loving all our clean windows, feel like we have a new house!!!!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!!--

name: Diane Glisson
text: Sparkle window cleaning does a great job.   The two techs that cleaned the outside of my home and cleaned my windows did a fantastic job yesterday.    Way to do a great job and pay attention to detail guys!!!!!!

name: Melanie Cadenhead
text: Windows look great!  Kendrick and Blake were very efficient and did an outstanding job cleaning both interior and exterior windows.  Will use again!!!

name: Tricia Golden
text: Adam and Blake were courteous, efficient and did an excellent job on my windows.  They look great!  Sparkle, overall, is a reliable and very professionally run business!

name: Kenneth Zouhary
text: Top notch service and highest quality work!  Great for business and residential.  Clean and efficient. Good people!

name: Laura
text: Kendrick and Blake were on time, professional and did a great job!

name: Penny Botta
text: Sparkle is a very professional company with wonderful representatives. Over the phone, Tabitha is so friend and easy to talk to.  She goes out of her way to accommodate any questions I have, even walking me through the website to find this page. Adam has cleaned our windows twice and does an awesome job.  We even have a fairly large sun room and he  makes it look brand new after he cleans it.  Adam is very courteous and takes extra care for my home, inside and out. He is extremely careful working around our house. I'm so happy I found Sparkle .

name: Julie Cullins
text: Excellent job on all windows and screens!  They were very clean and careful as they worked inside and outside our home, and they wore masks!  All screens were replaced and all windows were locked when they finished.

name: Martha Shepherd
text: Brett runs a top-notch customer-orientated business.  Highly recommend Sparkle!  Kendrick and Cole were on time and did a great job.  Very reasonably priced.  AND, my windows Sparkle!

name: Emily Harris
text:
Andrew and Caleb did an outstanding job cleaning our windows today. They were so professional and conscientious of their job!
*Andrew and David returned to do the inside and outside window cleaning today and did another outstanding job!

name: Vicky Jones
text:
5/2020.  This is the third or fourth time Sparkle has been to our home.  Today's experience was the best ever.  Staff were polite, careful, thorough and accommodating, did a great job and made sure I was satisfied.  I highly recommend them.

5/2021  Once again, Sparkle has done an excellent job and we are very satisfied with their work and their staff.  Could not have been any better.  Power pressure washing and rooftop was done a few months ago.  While I would use them again and again, their pricing now may be beyond what we are willing to pay.  Highly recommend Sparkle.

name: John Thompson
text: Extremely efficient with a friendly attitude

name: Meg & John Anderson
text: Just had our windows cleaned and they look awesome!  Fast, efficient and very friendly.  I definitely recommend them and have already signed up for the next cleaning in the Fall!

name: Prencella Hamby
text: Great job! All of the guys were very courteous and professional. They arrived early and worked hard all day. The porches, columns, rails, gutters and windows are so nice and clean. Plus the driveway looks like new, amazing! I’m very pleased and would recommend them to anyone!

name: Keely Beasecker
text: The staff is great to work with . They do all of our restaurants and do such a great job . The staff are very professional and nice/fun. Highly recommend this company

name: Glenn Johnson II
text: Special thank you to Kendrick and Blake, they did a fantastic job. Worked hard and fast, and did their best to keep the mess in my gutters out of my bushes and mulch patches. My gutters are hard to reach in some places and are shaded with thick trees in others, so it is not an easy job. They sprayed the front of my house for good message. Greatly appreciated. Definitely recommend

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Mr. Johnson!!  We appreciate the business!!

name: Scott Henderson
text: The guys stayed at it all day until completely finished!  Very hard workers with great attitudes!

name: Michael Arnold
text: Adam was at my house yesterday and did a great job cleaning the exterior glass in my windows. The windows have never looked this clean. He treated my furniture and even my dog with care. He also took the time to explain the cleaning procedures to me. If this employee is indicative of the other people you have working you have a great team. The person they sent cares about what he does and it shows.

name: Kelly Wallace
text: Brett and his team were prompt, friendly and professional.  All the members on the crew introduced themselves upon arrival and immediately got to work. They worked quickly and efficiently being careful to treat our home and belongings with care.  Our home has never looked better!  We look forward to getting on a regular maintenance program with the team from Sparkle.

name: Thomas Rigsby
text: Great job by Kendrick and Andrew!

name: Marcia Wagoner
text: It's not often a home service provider meets expectations much less exceeds them.  I can honestly say Sparkle did just that. Our windows were caked with construction dirt and dust. After one visit from a pair of friendly, competent techs and heavy rain the following several days, our windows are still sparkling😃

name: Aleem Gillani
text: This was the second time we’ve used them. David (senior member) and James (trainee) did a terrific job. We would recommend them highly.

name: Thomas Carlisle
text: Our second year to use Sparkle for window and gutter cleaning. Extremely pleased with professionalism of not only corporate booking staff, but also the crew performing work onsite. Caleb and Cole were prompt,  professional and friendly. Highly recommend the Spaekle team!

name: William Simmons
text: I wanted complement you and your team members, Adam and Blaze on a job very well done today on my windows, but most especially the thorough cleaning of the sills and tracks! They look amazing!!! Both gentlemen were super polite and did a great job! Just wanted you to know!

name: Barbara Ciulla
text: Jamie and Andrew arrived on time, were very personable, courteous and professional.  They worked in sync with each other...great team.  My windows and doors look fabulous. Thrilled to have this project done and will definitely schedule Sparkle again. Highly recommend!

name: Catharine Saunders
text: Super nice guys! Very attentive to details. Thank you!

name: Camille Rivenbark
text: Sparkle did a great job on our windows!  Very happy with the service!  They went above and beyond to work me in before the holiday company arrives.  Thanks so much!  I'll be calling again!

name: Sandra McAllister
text: My windows  sparkle and I have to say the two young men that came to my house were professional.  They got to work immediately and got the job done.  I have used your company before and will use you again.  Thank you Sparkle .

name: Banks Farris
text: The men who came to do our windows here on Saturday June27 were outstanding . Our windows are beautiful

text:
Kendrick and Cole did an excellent job cleaning all our windows.  We live on Lake Martin And our windows were very dirty.with carpenter bee insecticide spray, bird droppings, etc.

text: Brett and his team did an incredible job on our brick, windows, gutters, outdoor furniture,and awnings! They truly go the extra mile for each and every customer. Brett's kowledge of how to delicate areas of the house was quite impressive. We will never use anyone else again and highly recommend him to everyone!

name: liz shults
text: The three gentleman who arrived on time were prompt to begin work, never took a break and did a great job.  My windows truly do sparkle.  They gentleman were professional & kind - good experience and will definitely use again.

name: Susan Sneed
text: Adam and Blaze did a great job on our windows and gutters.  Adam did much more than expected when cleaning the gutters.  Blaze was so careful inside, and considerate of our home.  Everything sparkles!

The crew did a great job cleaning the windows, arrived on time and were very friendly.

Another good experience last week.  The guys arrive on time and do a good job.

name: paul thomas
text: Jamie and Andrew cleaned a new property for us prior to move in and the windows needed a lot of attention to detail. They did an amazing job, were wonderful to work with (even with my OCD, persnickety standards) and at one point, even figured out how to physically contort to reach an awkwardly placed window above stairs! Above and beyond - will work with them again!

name: Mike Arasin
text: Sparkle did a great job on cleaning out my gutters. They even charged me less than their original quote!

name: William Walls
text: Quality work. Very timely. The crew was professional and courteous. They were extremely detailed oriented. I would highly recommend Sparkle Window Cleaning.

name: Hugh Thompson
text: Sparkle did a great job cleaning the windows! This is the third year that we have used them and I am very satisfied.  Adam was wonderful to interface with and the team included Dillard worked very  efficiently. I will use them again next year and I highly recommend them.

name: Karen Treadwell
text: They showed up on time.  They took the time necessary to complete the job and it was well done!  They cleaned up and had a great attitude.  I've scheduled my gutters to be cleaned again next year!

name: Ella MacFiggen
text:
The technicians inside did a marvelous job with the cleaning, but they took extra care moving furniture and valuables?  Besides that, it was done in record time.

Outside was the same experience and when he was finished, he came inside to look around for any streaks and to let us know how to pay online.  Very professional.

name: Ginger Kelley
text:
We have just had our windows cleaned by Sparkle and couldn’t be more pleased!
Adam and Jermichael did a very professional job and couldn’t have been any nicer or more accommodating.  Some of our windows are in locations that are very difficult to access and clean and the effort they made to do the job well was greatly appreciated. This is the second time that we have had our windows cleaned by Sparkle and they just keep winning our admiration and gratitude for results that were beyond our expectations.

text: I had my windows cleaned and they look fantastic!  Extremely thorough job. Very friendly, courteous and professional!  I would not hesitate to recommend Sparkle to my friends!

text: Did a great job!  We had our windows cleaned, gutters, awnings and driveway.  Team is professional, personable and did a fantastic job.  Will definitely use again.

I'm so impressed that we've already set-up a maintenance plan which automatically schedules quarterly cleaning episodes throughout next year. These folks are sharp!

text: They showed up right on time and had everything they needed to finish the job. They worked steadily and finished when he said they would. I asked them to install a downspout through my deck. Stopped up down spout. Thanks so much.

name: Dawn Graves
text: Highly recommend this company. They explained to me everything that was done and it looks amazing. I am so happy with my new gutters. Very reasonable, professional, and went above and beyond my expectations.

name: Jay Haskew
text: Needed new gutters installed. They came out to inspect and supply a quote within a few days. Pricing provided was much better than previous quotes so we set the date for install which was within the next week. Pleasant and professional install crew was able to install in just over half a day for our single level. A couple of days after install we had our first significant rain and there was a very small issue that I reached back out to them about. They said they would do their best to get back out the next day the best they could. Later the same day, while it was still raining, then arrived, inspected and resolved our issue. I wish more companies  acted like they really care about the customer like That Gutter Guy does.

name: Bonnie Littlefield
text: Needed gutter gaurds... Ricky gave me a fair quote, same day. A gentlemen came out the following week to clean gutters and install gaurds.  Very professional and clean work.  He even remember to keep my gate close so my dog did not Escape.  Would recommend That Gutter Guy to anyone looking for gutter service

name: Jessika Ashlee (Hip and Simple)
text: We were really impressed with Ricky. He called me quickly with a quote. The price was excellent and we were able to get scheduled soon. He showed up on time, was great to work with and thorough. He hauled everything off and just made it easy. Highly recommend!

name: Tonya Weathers
text: Had gutters put up on our just purchased home. Professional and did great job. Rained few days later and very pleased with gutters.

name: Beth Crowder
text: They did a great job! Communicative, prompt, and professional. Thanks!

name: Carson Young
text:
Outstanding

Searched on Home Advisor and was contacted within minutes

Really thorough work. All hand cleaned so no spraying of gunk everywhere. Arrived on time. Fixed leaks. Cleaned gutters. Did any repairs needed and the price was really good

Need your gutters worked on? Look no further

text: Absolutely a wonderful group of people and service is fantastic

name: laurie wilson
text: Awsome 👍

name: L M
text: Justin did a great job on our house. I needed it cleaned last min for family coming down to see our new home for the first time and we couldn’t be happier.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review! I enjoyed working with you and hope to serve you again in the future!

name: Shaina
text: Justin did a fantastic job! I was blown away by how clean my driveway and deck were. It looked like a brand new house! He was quick, professional, and priced reasonably. If you need anything pressure washed, I would highly recommend him. He’s the only person I will hire moving forward!

resp.text: It was such a pleasure working for you, Shaina! Thank you for taking the time to leave such an awesome review. We appreciate your kind words and look forward to many years of service for you!

name: William Patterson
text: Justin did a great job pressure washing my driveway, walkways and sidewalk and looked beautiful and clean after he finished He charged a reasonable 10 cents per foot and he even returned later to pressure wash a small area of sidewalk that I overlooked at no charge! I highly recommend him and plan for him to come back ever year. Call him to clean your concrete and you be glad you did.

resp.text: William - Thank you so much for your review! I hope to serve you again soon!

name: Sarah Dunn
text: I've used this company twice to pressure wash/clean out my gutters, and they are excellent. They are also very easy to work with and trustworthy enough to do the job while you're at work or even out of town! The first time I hired them, I was out of town and they even texted me photos of the job to show me what had been done. I will continue to use them every time my gutters need attention.

resp.text: Sarah, I can't thank you enough for your amazing and thorough review! It is a pleasure to work with you time and time again! I appreciate your business and I look forward to cleaning your home and gutters for many years to come.

name: Liz Speights
text: Justin is a very nice and professional young man. He's very patient as well as he answered all of my curious questions and thoroughly explained the process. I was really pleased with the service I received for my cement  driveway and street gutters.

resp.text: Elizabeth, thank you so much for your amazing review! It is always great to hear from our awesome clients and I appreciate you taking the time to leave us your feedback. I look forward to servicing your pressure washing needs for years to come!

name: Andrew Miller
text: Very good and thorough.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Andrew! I appreciate your business and hope to serve you again in the future!

text: I had algae growing on my roof and contacted several companies to get quotes on getting it cleaned.  ProClean was by far the most responsive, professional and fairly priced.  Very happy with the services they performed and would highly recommend.

resp.text: We so appreciate your kind words and amazing review!! I cannot thank you enough for taking the time to leave us your feedback and I look forward to working for you for all of your pressure washing needs!

text: They are awesome!! Cleaned up my parent’s HUGE driveway in no time at all - it looked so good our next door neighbors used them to wash their driveway and house later that week. Super professional and high quality work!

resp.text: Thanks for your review and for trusting ProClean to give you all great results. I enjoyed working with your family and neighbors and hope to serve y'all again in the future!

name: Carolyn Binger
text: Over the years I have used several roofers in the Cullman area. Not anymore! I have found the guy. Shaun is honest, punctual and reasonable. He will be my go to roofer for all roofing needs in the future!!! Wouldn't hesitate to recommend him!

text: That guy that works for them is great. He know what he's doing. Excellent roofer.

text: Wonderful guys! They did an excellent job and we're very quick about it! Excellent price and service. I highly recommend them.

name: Jacqui Sweet
text: No return phone call to date.

name: Duke Tunstall
text:
Ryan and his team did an outstanding job on our gutters.  They were all custom made onsite and the job took 1/2 day from arrival through clean-up.  All the down spouts were placed in unobtrusive locations.  The gutter color matches our trim perfectly.  There are no complaints.

I cannot give any higher praise for a job well done with a VERY reasonable price.

name: Allyson McMaken
text: It was truly a pleasure to work with Ryan and his team! They installed new gutters on our house. In our communication with Ryan, he was personable, kind, and always willing to help. After the gutters were installed, he gave us the opportunity to ask questions and made sure we were completely satisfied. He and his team do quality work, and we highly recommend them.

name: Robert Scarborough
text: It was a great experience to get my guttering purchased and installed by Ryan and his team. Great job. I highly recommend this business

name: Dakota Lindsey
text: Ryan and his team installed new gutters on our home. They were highly recommended by other people in our neighborhood, and I'm happy to recommend them as well. They did excellent work, and Ryan was a pleasure to work with.

name: gmthecoolguy
text: Extremely positive experience with A1 Gutter Solutions. Excellent service all around. Ryan helped pick out an exact color match, answered all my questions, and came out to give me a very reasonable quote.  They explained exactly what they were going to do and when we scheduled an appointment, they came when they were supposed to come and did the job exactly for the price they quoted and exactly how they said they would get it done.  The color of the gutters match my paint exactly and it looks great.  Easy to work with, friendly, on time and good pricing.  What else can you ask for?  I highly recommend calling A1 if you need gutters. These guys are great on customer service. 5 stars doesn't come easy for me but this company deserves it.

name: David E.
text:
The name says it all. A1- Gutter Solutions is an A1 company. Ryan and his crew are top notch. They show up on time, are well organized, and they work well together as a team. Ryan stays on site and works with them the whole time.
I got 4 estimates for this job, A1 wasn't the cheapest, but after meeting with Ryan, It was obvious that he is a perfectionist, and I felt that I would be happy with the end results.
I am Very Happy with the High Quality installation and product,  I Highly Recommend Ryan and his team.

name: Stacie Sessions
text: Ryan is a good, honest dude. He provided a very reasonable quote, and my gutters were installed in 1/2 a day.  They look great and match my trim perfectly.  His team was very friendly and personable.  I could tell they take pride in what they do.  I would highly recommend this company to anyone looking to install/replace gutters...And he actually shows up when he tells you he is going to!  Imagine that!!

name: John Simmons
text:
Ryan came out and conducted a survey of my home and provided me a quote for gutters and a screened in porch that day.  He was very nice, respectful, and explained his services well.  I received three quotes for gutters and a screened porch, and A1 Gutter Solutions provided the best price. A1 Gutter Solutions is a fantastic company and I would recommend them to anyone who is looking for gutters or screened enclosures.

name: Eddie W
text: To properly rave on this company requires much more effort and time than just a "one liner"! Without any personal gain, we feel it is owed to this business to take time and publicly recognize why and how they stand out over many other Baldwin County small businesses and contractors. Hopefully it will inspire others to imitate what he models so well as true professionalism. 1.) A-1 was rapid in their response to telephone inquiries for an estimate and pleasant to speak with. 2.) They keep their appointment time and date, they did not forget that we were penciled in or have an excuse as to why they could not be on time; or worse just fail to show up at all with no return calls as to why they were MIA like many other contractors in the area. 3.) His sincere joy and gratitude to retain our business was immediately obvious and refreshing. He never put off an air that he was too busy or heavily sought after that our job was less valuable than other customers. 4.) His team worked well together and no one left trash (product debris/cans/cigarettes/etc) in our yard. They were all respectful to one another and of the property. 5.) The product itself is beyond expectations! Perfectly matched color for this home, impressively clean lines and actually an attractive addition to the home (which who says that about gutters ever). 6.) The crew were in an out within three to four hours, and without compromising the quality of their service. 7.) The value for what we paid is unbelievable! For a custom job like this, on a house this size, we still cannot believe what a great deal we received........ Everything that we read in reviews before retaining Ryan and his company, was spot on. We are so thankful that he is a part of this local area and that we did not attempt to buy box store gutters and install them our self. The seamless gutters are truly top quality and perfect in every way. If you hire this company, we believe that you too will be equally impressed on every level of expectation. Thank you A-1 Gutter Solutions and blessings to you and your families!!!

name: Juana Gutierrez
text: I was almost mowed down by an employee. Their blatant disregard for the rules of operating a motor vehicle is sickening. He was on his phone speeding and used no blinker in a construction zone on the interstate and had the audacity to shoot me the bird when I honked to let him know I was on the road. Ridiculous and rude.

resp.text:
Good evening Juana, I want to apologize for the incident earlier. I felt bad for making that Mistake and almost causing an accident. I told my employees I know I scared whoever was in the vehicle and I actually said sorry and threw my hand up (even though you couldn't see me or hear me). I have children too, so I know the feeling even if it wasn't children involved everyone's life is precious and
valuable. I'm sorry for that.  I wasn't on the phone nor was I speeding I was coming on to the highway off the bypass my lane was running out I was near the end a truck had moved over, so I started to move over as well to get on to the highway and you were in my blind spot I didn't see you. I am not a reckless driver nor would I ever risk lives intentionally, i didn't see you in my blind spot I looked twice and was seeing my lane running out, so when the truck moved over to let me in that's when I proceeded to move over not knowing you were back there. I'm happy everyone was and is safe. I do understand your frustration, I would've been to and have been in that situation before. However, I do truly feel you can forgive me for a mistake like I forgave them.

text: Carl came out and got the job done! house looks brand-new the doors almost blinded us when we looked at him we will definitely use them again!!

text: Good service

name: Stephen Rome
text:
I no longer must get out my ladder to clear the leaves and debris from my gutters. I would put this off for too long and the gutters would usually overflow during the spring rains. Now I do not have to worry about cleaning out the gutters frequently enough.

The crew that installed the gutters and filters arrived promptly on the day scheduled. They explained the installation to us and proceeded to install the product. They were very polite and professional. They cleaned up the site after they finished. Overall, it was a very satisfying experience.

resp.text: We are happy your gutters are clog free and that LeafFilter was able to help. Welcome to the LeafFilter family, Stephen!

name: Gwen Smith
text:
I prolonged getting gutters until I could find the best leaf filter system because we have many trees.This leaf filter system is a superior product. The warranty is matchless in the industry and transferable. We will not ever have to clean out gutters for life of the product.

Professional and friendly salesman! Our Install was scheduled only a few days after we received the quote.

Installer was a perfectionist. He customized three downspouts for rain barrels and navigated one downspout over pool pump.

The Leaf Filter Product is not cheap but worth every dime. We already had two downpours and worked perfectly. Exceptional product and service all the way through!

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review and for taking the time to share your feedback with LeafFilter, Gwen. Our priority is customer service, and we are ecstatic that we met that mark!

name: Patti Silvester
text:
Had decided to go with this company but had questions and after 3 weeks with no response got another company that was half the price with the same quality. After cancelling leafFilter they showed up 2 weeks later to install. We sent them away. They claim lifetime warranty but they charge $$$$$ to come to your home to look to see if it fits under their "lifetime" warranty, which it usually does not.  Buyer BEWARE!!!!
Update: after our gutters were installed, from the other company, 2 of our neighbors were so impressed with the looks and quality they are having gutters installed from the same company we used......LeafFilter should have better customer service and they could have had business from 3 households..YOU SNOOZE YOU LOOSE...🤷🏻‍♀️

name: sg1audio
text: Couple of things. Sales rep starts at a super high price then drops it to just high. They wanted over 40 dollars a ft for this. They also offered same as cash 12 months and will say the interest rate if not paid within the 12 months (balance in full ) is around 12 percent. Wells Fargo informed me that the MERCHANT sets the interest rate not them. 28.99 percent! They also require you to send them a letter if you choose to cancel Post marked within three days. From what I have read on the net the Avg cost for 150 ft should be around 1500 to 2000. They wanted 4300 after so called discounts. I could hire a  man to come clean my gutters 4 times a year at 100 per pop and I still would have cash left over after 10 years of paying someone to do that. Beware! Just not worth what they are asking for this product.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with this valuable feedback. We never want to appear misleading and are always looking to make improvements. Remember, our product is backed by a lifetime, transferable warranty. For this reason, we hope that you find gutter protection to be a worthy investment on your home.

name: R Pyetzki
text: Installed gutters .... had some leaks .... called 800# and the local office that installed called next day!  Sent inspector out following day....and then had someone fix problem immediately!!!  Lifetime warranty is awesome!!!

resp.text: Thank you for recognizing our 5-star service!

name: Patti Pinkerton
text: I just want to take a moment to warn anyone who is looking for gutters to look elsewhere. This company is the worst. I bought gutters last week and gave them my CC information to pay in full. I have a signed contract with installation scheduled for between 9 and 11 am today. At 12:45 I called to see why they were not here. After 3 hours of being lied to on 3 separate calls I gave up. My salesman was Stephen, whatever you do don't buy anything from this guy, he doesn't follow up and is totally worthless. I lost an entire day waiting for these people to come do something I was paying them $4800 to do with no results. They are the worst.

resp.text: I am very sorry to hear about this, Patti. Please give our service team a call directly at 800-749-4566 so we can help.

name: Melanie Torres
text: The price was a bit steep, but the product was excellent. I would recommend this product and company to friends and family.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback!

name: Jay Bond
text:
We had the LeaFilter Gutter Protection system installed on our house last November. There were some things about the installation process that I had to question  which was them wanting to install it in the pouring rain. I insisted they wait until it was dry to seal the gutters. The technicians installing the gutters were fast but not as detailed as I was hoping and as I was told during the sales presentation. They did not clear the downspouts prior to installation and I found out  the hard way  after the first good rain. I did not see them check  the drop of the gutters as well but that wasn't really a big problem in my case.
My areas of disappointment with this system is that the flashing that was  installed at the base of the valleys does not allow any debris from leaves, small twigs etc to drop off the gutters so it thus causes build up. When it rains, the water routes around the flashing and debris and runs directly over the gutters instead of into the gutter and on to the down spouts. When the technician came out he stated that there is no way to prevent the build up at those locations and that someone would have to get on the roof to clear the debris from time to time to prevent it from happening. This is in direct contradiction to the advertisement shown on TV that states that, "once installed you wont have to get on the roof again." I feel  that is very deceptive, dishonest advertising. Granted you wont have to clean out the actual gutters but you will have to get on the roof, nonetheless, to clear the debris from behind the flashing in the valleys. I was hoping that I wouldn't ever have to get back on the roof again. I can manage it now but in 10 years I'll be 70 years old and probably not be able to so will have to hire someone. Otherwise, the rain is handled well  by the rest of the gutter system and they don't get clogged up.  I'm now waiting for hurricane season to give them the real test. We'll see what happens, wish me luck!

text: The day the third insurance inspector came to my home, Bryan, the owner met with him and he was able to explain why my roof needed to be replaced.It had been a battle up to that point. It took only 2 days for removal and installation of my new roof which is amazing because mine is very high pitch. Each day they cleaned up their debris (shingles, nails, etc..) and when the dumpster they used leaked hydraulic fluid onto my driveway, they pressure washed the spot. His crew even replaced a board on the side of my home that had a rotten spot. I cant tell you how pleased I am with the aesthetics of my new roof, not to mention how structurally sound it is. 2nd to None had the highest warranty (7 years) of all the companies I was considering which was also a deciding factor for me . Most only have a 5 years warranty and one had only 2 years. When a company can stand behind their workmanship, they deserve my business. Bryan also worked closely with me to make sure I had the right type of shingle (color, functionality). He also imparted valuable advice regarding which shingle manufactures are honoring their warranties. Also..it needs to be mentioned that before they installed the new roof, I had a portion of my old roof tarped but the wind blew it off. Of course heavy rains came and water was leaking in several spots on my roof and into my master bathroom/closet. It was raining and lightening when his crew got on my roof to retarp/stop the leakage. That was also a deciding point for me that I would be using his company for my new roof. I can tell you most companies would not have done that. Also Bryan worked diligently with my Allstate adjuster explaining the cost of the roof which they had initially underestimated. I highly recommend 2nd to None and I have been telling my coworkers/friends about his company as well.

resp.text:

Bryan

We were fortunate that our realtors found a company in 2nd2None that could do both roof and chimney inspections.  I can't speak to the level of expertise of Yellow Roofing (the company the previous owner had do a second opinion and said the roof was fine); but I can tell you that I saw with my own eyes that the roof was in bad shape as noted by Bryan; and was very appreciative that 2nd2None Roofing was able to do the inspection on short notice as well schedule and complete the work so quickly after requesting the work to be done.

I called Bryan Thursday Dec 31st after closing and he was able to schedule a crew to come Wed Jan 6, 2020 and repair the chimney as well as replace the roof.  They brought in extra people and were able to get all the work done in one day because they knew it was going to rain today.

I am so thankful that they could do both roofing and chimney inspections as well as repairs.  If you need inspections and roof/chimney repair work, I would recommend using 2nd2None Roofing and Construction.

text:
I am a long time customer of David Stewart and his crew doing business as The Handymen LLC in Foley.  This time I used David and his company for Hurricane Sally repairs. However, the fact that my damage was not major caused some of the contractors I spoke to to put me off or quote me exorbitant prices to do the work.

The Handymen came out and did roof work one weekend and then David personally came by on a Sunday afternoon and repaired a window for me.  David told me how the job was going to be done and the materials required.  Again, not a huge project but one that required skill, knowledge, and the correct tools.  Of course it turned out well.

I have used this company on two other occasions for exterior work on my townhome.  I know they are licensed in Gulf Shores and have done many projects here.  I have not had to call them out to “repair” their repairs like some of the others that I have used previously.  I have no reservations in recommending The Handymen LLC of Foley to others seeking home repairs.

name: Rachel Holley
text: I originally called Handymen, LLC to remove the carpet in my garden room and to replace it with bamboo tile...Two days before the project began, I cut the carpet and discovered old painted hardwood boards in perfect condition...I sent pictures to David Stewart, the General Contractor, and he didn't mind quickly changing plans so that we could preserve the beauty of these 74 year old floors...The before and after pictures are below...Simply amazing...David Stewart made my dreams come true...His ideas are unique and he tailors everything according to your requests...All work was impeccably done...And David had the proper permits from the City of Mobile...If you have any dreams of what you may want done, David Stewart will make it happen...And all of his work is done to code...He will keep you apprised all along the way as to true expectations in remodeling or repair and pricing...There were no surprises with invoicing...Handymen, LLC will be doing all of my future projects...They are very trustworthy and they clean up after the job is done...The Highest Quality Work I Have Ever Seen...
